edu.berkeley.cs.succinct

Interface SuccinctIndexedFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, SuccinctFile
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuccinctIndexedFileBuffer

    public interface SuccinctIndexedFile
extends SuccinctFile

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SuccinctIndexedFile.QueryType
      Defines the types of search queries that SuccinctIndexedBuffer can handle in a recordMultiSearchIds.
      static class  SuccinctIndexedFile.RangeSizeComparator
      Comparator for range objects based on the size of the range.

      • recordMultiSearchIds

                                       byte[][][] queries)

        Parameters:
        queryTypes - The QueryType corresponding to each query
        queries - The actual query parameters associated with each query
        Returns:
